participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending time with my grandchildren and sister, reading, and gardening.
I dyed my hair blonde and watched a game show.
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
i dance ballet.

participant_2.background:
I am still haunted by the events of that day, but I am trying to move on with my life.
i have been married for five years.
I have been in the wedding planning business for four years now.
I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them.
I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.

content.text: What did you do for your last birthday?
I went to a spa and got a massage and facial. It was really relaxing.
That sounds lovely. I dyed my hair blonde and watched a game show.
That sounds like a fun day. I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel.
What kind of novel are you writing?
It's a mystery novel. I'm really enjoying writing it.
That sounds really interesting. I'm not much of a writer, but I love to read.
I love to read too. I'm a big fan of mysteries and thrillers.
Me too. I also like to read historical fiction and romance novels.
Those are all good genres. I'm not a big fan of romance novels, but I do enjoy historical fiction.
I'm glad we have something in common. What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon. I also love the Jane Austen novels.
I've heard good things about Outlander. I've never read any Jane Austen novels, but I've heard they're good too.
You should give them a try. They're really well-written.
I'll have to check them out.
